roleset.name: not be darkened by contrast dye, not enhancing, growing greater

role.descr: instrument to show no enhancement (ie PET or CT scan)

example.name: Arg 0 - you need the contrast to see enhancement/non-enhancement on CT
Arg1 only, probably very typical usage
example.text: - In reviewing the scans , I see no clear - cut benefit of trying to obtain tissue diagnosis seeing as how the lesion isnonenhancing and is rather sparse.

roleset.note: NONENHANCE-V NOTES: Based on Thyme data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from nonenhance.01-v)
NONENHANCING-J NOTES: Based on instances in Thyme and comparison to enhancing-j.01. (from nonenhancing.01-j)
I don't think all of these roles are possible with negative polarity item, but exist for symmetry. (from nonenhancing.01-j)
